com.centimia.orm.jaqu
Interface FullQueryInterface<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Superinterfaces:
QueryInterface<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Query
public interface FullQueryInterface<T>
extends QueryInterface<T>

The use of query interfaces is to divide different query abilities in different stages of the query.

Author:
Shai Bentin

selectDistinct

Returns distinct results of type X using az query on object Z
